String.string: The Imprisoned God
"Count on it."
[Kaiator HQ] Meet with Tamur before heading off to Southern Shara.
"I shall."
[Allemantheia HQ] Meet with Fraya and request assistance in defeating Kelsaik.
"I'll speak to Legia, then."
[Elenea] Speak with Elvar and get information on Saleron and the Crypt.
[Saleron Research Camp] Speak with Legia and get information on Saleron.
"I'm listening."
[Saleron Research Camp] Speak with Prophet Torsten.
[Saleron Research Camp] Speak with Prophet Torsten again.
Ravenous Tyrak Core
Kikik! A bug flew in!
Eliminate ravenous tyraks and collect their cores as proof of their deaths.
[Ebon Span at Crypt of the Lost] Find Saleron and speak to him.
"Thank you, Saleron."
Dragon's Soul Stone
[Saleron's Sky Garden] [Go through Saleron to get to the Sky Garden] Eliminate the dragon and overcome Saleron's tests.
Bring the dragon's soul stone to Prophet Torsten and receive the relic fragment.
"I understand."
The relic fragment's power is yours!
Bring the relic fragment closer.
"Victory for Valkyon!"
[Ebon Span at Crypt of the Lost] Go back to the Ebon Span and speak with Saleron.
